descriptionHTML:
Trueborn watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Trueborn Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Trueborn Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ 24-hour time format
✔ Ambient mode
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month

How to use Trueborn Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Trueborn watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Trueborn Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market
comments: I like it, but how do I change the date format?

Edit: Fantastic response from developer, bug is now fixed within less than 24 hours!!! Thanks! (Original review: Looks great, but the date is wrong. Shows 21/2, all other watchfaces are correctly showing 21/3.)
